Name: Austerity
Description: Lose all of your Traits. Gain 5 Gold.

Name: Concession
Description: Permanently lose all the Banners in your hand (Banners on the board are unaffected). Gain 5 Gold.

Name: Expedience
Description: When you play this, your turn ends immediately, and you will not play the Banner phase of your turn. Gain 5 Gold.

Name: Generosity
Description: Give all the Cards in your hand to other players. Gain 5 Gold.

Name: Inheritance
Description: Choose another player. They gain 10 Gold. You gain 5 Gold.

Name: Sacrifice
Description: Permanently lose all of the Acolytes in your hand (Acolytes on the board are not affected). Gain 5 Gold.

Name: Totality
Description: Remove each of your Banners and Acolytes from the board and return them to your hand. Gain 5 Gold.
